snippet.title: PHD Comics TRUE TALES on DARK MATTERS A conversation with Daniel Whiteson and Jonathan Feng
snippet.description:
PHD Comics TRUE TALES on DARK MATTERS A conversation with Daniel Whiteson and Jonathan Feng
Produced by: Piled Higher and Deeper Director: Jorge Cham 06:05 min. / 01 June 2011 / © 2011 PHDCOMICS Keywords: dark matter, dark, matter, universe, milky way, solar, galaxy, force Reference: CERN-MOVIE-2011-084 Language: English

snippet.title: Comic book tells the tale of Dark Matter Une bande dessinée pour raconter l'histoire de la matière noire
snippet.description: Comic book tells the tale of Dark Matter Une bande dessinée pour raconter l'histoire de la matière noire / Katarina Anthony The sciences star in few comic books. On occasion, the comic narrative may feature a villain using science for his nefarious deeds [...] BUL-NA-2011-140.- 2011 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 24/2011 25/2011 Fulltext: tt2_image \- PNG; truet(1)_image \- PNG; tt_image \- PNG;

snippet.title: Stand-up physics La physique fait son stand-up
snippet.description:
Stand-up physics La physique fait son stand-up /
A CMS physicist and amateur stand up comic was named the winner of NESTA FameLab 2009. Tom Whyntie battled it out with nine others young scientists from across the UK to win the contest to find the country’s next top science communicator [...] BUL-NA-2009-133; 28/2009; 29/2009.- 2009 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 28/2009 29/2009
